column4: ok, I'm running a live disk since my laptop hard drive blew out, is there a way to boot the desktop live disk to a shell only so I can save memory and load mu internet connection sharing? I run out of memory whenever X runs cause it doesn't have enough to download dnsmasq and ipmasq into ram
or is there a way to have it mount a flash drive and use it for downloads?
you could do as Dr_willis suggests pendrivelinux dot com has much more on that front
you can /msg ubotu if you wish
